title: RotatedTime
summary: A minimalist watch face for Android Wear that shows the time as the minute hand
description: A minimalist watch face for Android Wear that shows the time as the minute handThe date and a second hand show when you activate the display. Ambient mode is just the minute hand.This is a great watch face to save on battery drain! My Huawei Watch using this watch face barely drains half its battery in one day. The majority black screen and minimalist design keep power usage very low.
descriptionHTML:
A minimalist watch face for Android Wear that shows the time as the minute hand

The date and a second hand show when you activate the display. Ambient mode is just the minute hand.

This is a great watch face to save on battery drain! My Huawei Watch using this watch face barely drains half its battery in one day. The majority black screen and minimalist design keep power usage very low.
comments: Not bad A cool idea with a useful date display.  Unfortunately the card preview covers the face.
